article_title: Chris Rey wants to bring mayoral, military background to Senate
article_text:
Spring Lake mayor says he has turned his hometown around

Rey’s campaign focuses on poverty issues

What role does race play in his candidacy?

article_metadata.news-keywords: chris, rey, spring lake, mayor, senate, black, candidate, campaign, senate, north carolina, nc, democrat
article_metadata.description: Small-town mayor to U.S. senator is a challenging political jump, but Spring Lake Mayor Chris Rey says his work turning around a scandal-ridden Fayetteville suburb is solid experience for Congress.
